actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: Recognizing the spirit of Jacob Mock Doub and his contribution to encouraging youth to be physically active and fit and expressing the sense of Congress that "National Take a Kid Mountain Biking Day" should be established in Jacob Mock Doub's honor.

summary.text: Recognizes: (1) the health risks associated with childhood obesity; and (2) the spirit of Jacob Mock Doub and his contribution to encouraging youth to be physically active and fit, especially through bicycling. Expresses the sense of Congress that National Take a Kid Mountain Biking Day should be established in his honor. Encourages parents, schools, civic organizations, and students to promote increased physical activity among youth in the United States.

titles.title: Recognizing the spirit of Jacob Mock Doub and his contribution to encouraging youth to be physically active and fit and expressing the sense of Congress that "National Take a Kid Mountain Biking Day" should be established in Jacob Mock Doub's honor.
